content.p: General Criteria Applying Students must submit their form together with all the supporting documents to Sponsorship Unit before the deadline. Deadline for 2024 : 15 Jan / 15 March / 15 May / 15 July / 15 September / 15 November Hardship Fund Application Form Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia University of Nottingham Malaysia DULN001(B) telephone: +6 03 8924 8000 fax: +6 03 8924 8005 course enquiries: +6 03 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays)
